Trade/Device Name(s): Glucose Meter-Check Control Solution for AgaMatrix
Specimen Container(s): 6 mL LDPE vial with dispensing tip and cap
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): AgaMatrix blood glucose monitoring test systems utilizing the WaveSense family of blood glucose test strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Glucose Meter-Check Control Solution for AgaMatrix used to verify performance of AgaMatrix blood glucose monitoring systems
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to verify the performance and correct operation of AgaMatrix blood glucose monitoring test systems utilizing WaveSense blood glucose test strips for use by healthcare professionals and people with diabetes mellitus at home
